detail_desc: Jacket in woven fabric with a concealed two-way zip down the front and a lined stand-up collar with fasteners. Long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, flap side pockets with a button, and a ribbed hem. Lined.
Dungarees in washed stretch denim with worn details and adjustable straps. Chest pocket, side and back pockets, buttons at the sides and tapered legs.
Calf-length, bell-shaped skirt in a patterned weave with a wrapover and concealed fastening at the front and ties at the sides. Unlined.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in soft fabric with smocking at the top and hem, and long wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Jumper in fine-knit merino wool with a ribbed turtle neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a turn-down collar and chest pocket. Easy-iron finish.
T-shirt in striped, airy linen jersey with a round neckline.
Sleeveless blouse in linen with a deep V-neck front and back, buttons down the front and a seam at the waist with a flared peplum.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Push-up bra in lace and microfibre with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, gently fitted dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Short, elasticated puff sleeves. Unlined.
5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in washed cotton twill with a high waist and wide, tapered legs with decorative seams at the hems.
T-shirt in soft jersey with reversible sequins on the front and a rounded hem.
Ballet pump-style espadrilles in satin with a decorative bow at the front and braided jute trim around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Short, gently tailored dungaree dress in corduroy with adjustable shoulder straps, buttons down the front, a seam at the waist and large patch front pockets.
Headband in a soft knit containing some wool with a draped detail at the front. Width approx. 11.5 cm.
Wide jumper in a cool, fine-knit viscose blend with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders, long, narrow sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, straight-cut coat in bouclé made from a wool blend. Double-breasted with notch lapels and large patch front pockets. Lined.

Shirt in a viscose and cotton blend with a turn-down collar and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short top in flock-patterned mesh. Short puff sleeves with smocked hems. Unlined.
Set with a dress and leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Dress with cap sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Lace body with cut-out sections in the sides and non-wired, mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and good support. High-cut legs, half-string back and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Straight-style T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Bucket hat in a patterned cotton weave. Width of brim approx. 5 cm. Lined.

Jacket in a nylon blend with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front and ventilation holes under the arms. Zipped side pockets, a tab and hook and loop fastening at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Top in soft, airy jersey made from a silk and Tencel™ lyocell blend with a V-neck and long sleeves.
Set with a hat and mittens knitted in a soft cotton blend. Hat with ears on top, embroidered details at the front and a ribbed hem. Mittens with ribbed cuffs. Size 2-6M without thumbs.
Short jacket in woven fabric with decorative embroidery and lace trims. Dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and ties at the front.
Jersey maxi dress with a low-cut back with crossover straps, short cap sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and slits in the sides.
Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a sheen. Opening with a covered button at the back of the neck, short puff sleeves and a narrow elasticated seam with detachable ties under the bust. Unlined.
Tops in soft jersey with a racer back and an elasticated hem. The tops are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Cardigan in an extra-soft, fine-knit viscose blend with long sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Leggings in printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high cut at the back.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Boxy-style jacket in quilted imitation leather with a high stand-up collar, covered press-studs down the front, dropped shoulders and diagonal side pockets. Detachable tie belt to define the waist. Lined.
Sleeveless dress with a patterned satin bodice with appliqués, a small stand-up collar and a concealed zip at the back. Skirt in a double layer of tulle. Lined.
Calf-length skirt in a soft jacquard knit with a high waist, covered elastic waistband and a slit at the back. Unlined.
Biker jacket in imitation leather with embroidery and a diagonal zip at the front and notch lapels with press-studs. Diagonal side pockets with a zip, and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.

Shirt jacket in rustly nylon with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets with concealed press-studs, discreet, mesh-lined side pockets with a zip, and concealed fasteners at the cuffs.
Soft, non-wired bra in silk with lined cups and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Elastication at the hem and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sleeveless dress in soft cotton jersey with a flounced trim over the shoulders and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the top and a flared skirt.
Shorts woven in a linen blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, two fake back pockets and short slits in the hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front.
Jumper in a soft slub knit with a brushed finish. Deep V-neck with a raw-edge lace trim, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a straight-cut hem.
Chinos in soft, washed cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Nursing top in patterned viscose jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top, seam under the bust and short, flounced sleeves. Practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with print stripes and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper knitted in a soft mohair blend with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved dress in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend. Round neckline with buttons at the back of the neck, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Belt with two rows of metal eyelets and a metal buckle. Width 4 cm.
Long-sleeved piqué top in fine-knit merino wool with a ribbed collar, button placket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Longer style, thin metal chain necklace with an adjustable fastener and a rhinestone-decorated pendant in the shape of an eye.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton with a round neck, long sleeves, chest pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a padded top edge and lacing with speed hooks at the front. Pile linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Long-sleeved dress in a cotton weave with buttons at the back of the neck, a yoke with decorative gathers front and back, and elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.

Corduroy jacket in a cotton blend with embroidery, a collar, yoke and press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, adjustable tabs and press studs at the back and a press-stud at the cuffs. Lined, partly with pile.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short sleeves, a print motif on the front and decorative crossed straps at the back.
Relaxed-fit joggers in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a button and pockets front and back. Tapered legs with elastication at the hems.

Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck, wrapover front and short butterfly sleeves. Gathered seam at the waist, a concealed zip in the side and gently flared skirt with embroidery and a flounce at the hem. Broderie anglaise around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Lined.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Cropped top in a patterned stretch weave with a square neckline, wide shoulder straps and wide smocking at back. Jersey lining.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar with a piped trim and French front. Yoke and darts at the back, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Fine-knit shaftless socks with a silicone trim around the heel to hold them in place.
Leggings in airy jersey made from a silk and viscose blend. High, elasticated waist and raw-edge hems.
Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined trousers in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a fake fly with decorative buttons.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Short, fitted, sleeveless top in ribbed jersey with a stand-up collar.
Tube top in smocked cotton jersey with a frill trim top and bottom.
Long-sleeved polo shirt in stretch jersey made from a cotton blend with a collar and button placket. Slim Fit.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Sandals in scuba fabric with an adjustable foot strap and heel strap with hook and loop fastenings and a loop at the back. Embossed ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Metal corkscrew hoop earrings. Diameter 3 cm.
Straight-cut, off-the-shoulder blouse in a softly draping, patterned weave with a sheen. Wide, covered elastication at the top and short raglan sleeves.
